name: places/ChIJL8_S1Yf2wokRaR0678KMkUs
adrFormatAddress: 3675 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-1510, USA

originalText.text: The best laundry uptown BY FAR fast delivery and quick pick up for an affordable price. I would HIGHLY recommend. And the folding is crisp.

text.text: The best laundry uptown BY FAR fast delivery and quick pick up for an affordable price. I would HIGHLY recommend. And the folding is crisp.

originalText.text: Friendly staff, good prices, fast service, laundry comes out clean and well folded. It’s my go-to spot. I used them in a pinch one time and ended up switching from my old service to them because I felt it was better.

text.text: Friendly staff, good prices, fast service, laundry comes out clean and well folded. It’s my go-to spot. I used them in a pinch one time and ended up switching from my old service to them because I felt it was better.

originalText.text: Ive been using this service for a year but have always done my own laundry because i was always skeptical of random people touching my things.  If your in the area and looking for a delivery wash and fold, this is IT!  Timely service and great communication and they treat your things with care. Thank you guys so much!

text.text: Ive been using this service for a year but have always done my own laundry because i was always skeptical of random people touching my things.  If your in the area and looking for a delivery wash and fold, this is IT!  Timely service and great communication and they treat your things with care. Thank you guys so much!

originalText.text: I love dropping off my laundry here. Rates are very reasonable and the folding is just glorious. Vicki, the owner, is super-nice and always remembers that I don't want any scent or fabric softener (but be sure to tell whoever takes your laundry that this is the case). I have a nice laundry room in my building, but it's safer to drop off the laundry and definitely worth spending just a few dollars more.

text.text: I love dropping off my laundry here. Rates are very reasonable and the folding is just glorious. originalText.text: Love to do a drop off & pick up wash & fold here!! The prices are great ($10 for first 10 lbs, then 90 cents for every pound after that), the people are nice, and it’s usually done within 3 hours. Can’t beat these prices for day of service!! Only con is they are cash only—but there is an ATM next door if you ever get stuck
